name: Desert Bus Zasetchi
description:
Sorry in advance for whoever finds this. It's bussing awful. Enjoy!

I didn't know where to go with the "Driver Chair" theme of the jam, so I just leaned into it.

Now you get to have a chair of your own! You can feed it! Clean it! Try to wash that desert bus funk away. But it never will go away, will it?

Based heavily on the Tamagotchi(tm) pet from Bandai. Tamagotchi is a portmanteau  of the Japanese words for egg and watchi, Tamago and U~otchi. So I used the word for seat, Zaseki and we have the Zasetchi.
